sentences.sContent: He looked surprised to see Cassie standing by the front door.
sentences.sCn: 他看到卡西站在前门旁，显得很吃惊。

sentences.sContent: He had a surprised look on his face.
Don’t be surprised if the interviewer is rather direct.
sentences.sCn: 如果采访的人说话比较直接，也不要吃惊。

sentences.sContent: I wouldn’t be surprised if she married that fellow.
sentences.sCn: 要是她嫁给那家伙，我不会感到意外。

phrases.pCn: 对…感到惊奇；使…感到意外；对……很吃惊

words.tran: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）
